name: AFGEquipmentAttachment
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Replication.

methods.name: BeginPlay
methods.comment: Begin AActor interface

methods.name: Attach
methods.comment: Attaches this attachment to a character

methods.name: OnAttach
methods.comment: Event called when this equipment has been attached

methods.name: Detach
methods.comment: Detach from current parent

methods.name: OnDetach
methods.comment: Event called before this equipment is detached

methods.name: IsAttached
methods.comment: @return true if this is attached; false if not.

methods.name: SetEquippedSlot
methods.comment: Sets what slot we are equipped on

methods.name: GetEquippedSlot
methods.comment: @return The equipment slot that this attachment is associated with

methods.name: SetAttachmentUseState
methods.comment: Calls UpdateUseState on all instances on all connections so that they can handle any visual effects they need to.

methods.name: OnAttachmentUseStateUpdated
methods.comment: Event called when use state is updated

methods.name: PlayAttachEffects3P
methods.comment: Event called when we should play attach effects

methods.name: PlayDetachEffects3P
methods.comment: Event called when we should play detach

methods.name: SetUseLocation
methods.comment: Set the use location on server so that it can be relicated to clients

methods.name: PlayUseEffect
methods.comment: Handles playing of effects on remote clients

methods.name: GetArmsAnimation
methods.comment: Get the arms animation to play on the player

methods.name: GetBackAnimation
methods.comment: Get the back animation to play on the player

methods.name: GetAttachedTo
methods.comment: @return character this is attached to; nullptr if not attached.

methods.name: GetAttachSocket
methods.comment: @return socket this should attach to, can be none.

methods.name: OnRep_UseLocationUpdated
methods.comment: Called when we get a new use location, on client through replication and on server from SetFlashLocation

methods.name: OnRep_OnAnimationStateUpdated
methods.comment: Called when the animation state has been updated

methods.name: SetAttachmentTicks
methods.comment: Sets tick status for actor and all components

properties.name: mEquipmentClass
properties.comment: The class of the equipment that spawned this attachment

properties.name: mUseLocation
properties.comment: This value get replicated to clients so they can play effect

properties.name: mAttachSocket
properties.comment: If this equipment should attach to a socket, this is the socket.

properties.name: mArmAnimation
properties.comment: Arms animation this should play on the when the equipment is equipped (only used if mEquipmentSlot == ES_ARMS)

properties.name: mBackAnimation
properties.comment: Arms animation this should play on the when the equipment is equipped (only used if mEquipmentSlot == ES_BACK)

properties.name: mAttachedTo
properties.comment: The character this is attached to.

properties.name: mEquipmentSlot
properties.comment: To what slot is this attachment attached
